description.value: You gain access to a powerful new school spell depending on your arcane school. If you're an abjurer, you gain energy absorption; if you're a conjurer, you gain dimensional steps; if you're a diviner, you gain vigilant eye; if you're an enchanter, you gain dread aura; if you're an evoker, you gain elemental tempest; if you're an illusionist, you gain invisibility cloak; if you're a necromancer, you gain life siphon; and if you're a transmuter, you gain shifting form. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
